resource_dependency.dbSchema_companyInfo: Table 'company_info' with columns: id (primary key), history (text), mission (text), values (text)

function: Display the company's history, mission, and values fetched dynamically from the backend.
static_description: A section titled 'About Us' with three subsections: History, Mission, and Values. Each subsection displays text content retrieved via API. Background uses lemon chiffon (#FFFACD) and components use chocolate (#D2691E).

interaction_and_states.description: On page load, data is fetched from /api/company-info endpoint and displayed in respective sections.

resource_dependency.dbSchema_products: Table 'products' with columns: id (primary key), name (string), description (text), image_url (string), price (decimal)

function: Showcase all available solar products with images, descriptions, and pricing.
static_description: A grid-based layout presenting each product as a card containing an image, title, short description, and price. Cards are styled with chocolate backgrounds on lemon chiffon page background.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a product card navigates to a dedicated product detail page showing full information.
Product cards slightly elevate or highlight when hovered over for better interactivity.

resource_dependency.dbSchema_news: Table 'news' with columns: id (primary key), title (string), date (timestamp), summary (text), content (text), image_url (string)

function: Display latest company news and events in chronological order.
static_description: A vertical timeline or list of articles with titles, dates, summaries, and optional thumbnails. Styled with lemon chiffon background and chocolate text/cards.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking an article expands its content or redirects to a full news detail page.

resource_dependency.dbSchema_contactMessages: Table 'contact_messages' with columns: id (primary key), name (string), email (string), message (text), submitted_at (timestamp)

function: Allow users to send messages directly to the company through a web form.
static_description: A form with labeled fields for Name, Email, and Message, along with a Submit button. Form elements have chocolate borders/backgrounds against lemon chiffon backdrop.

interaction_and_states.description: Form validates inputs; shows error messages if invalid, otherwise sends POST request to /api/contact and displays success confirmation.
Each field highlights on focus for accessibility purposes.

function: Provide easy access to major sections of the website via persistent navigation.
static_description: A horizontal menu bar fixed at the top featuring links to Home, About Us, Products, News, and Contact pages. Uses chocolate background with white text over lemon chiffon context.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking any menu item scrolls smoothly to the corresponding section or navigates to the relevant standalone page.
Menu items change color subtly to indicate they're interactive.

resource_dependency.seoMetadataSchema: { title: string, metaDescription: string } for each route

function: Ensure SEO best practices by providing unique titles and meta descriptions per section.
static_description: Each HTML document includes custom <title> and <meta name='description'> tags generated server-side based on current route/path.

function: Make the entire site accessible using standard keyboard navigation and screen readers.
static_description: All interactive elements such as buttons, links, and forms are fully focusable and operable via keyboard. Semantic HTML is used throughout.

interaction_and_states.description: Users can tab through focusable elements in logical sequence without getting trapped.
Pressing Enter or Space activates focused buttons and links.

resource_dependency.structuredDataFormat: JSON-LD schema markup for Organization, Product, Article, and WebSite

function: Improve search engine understanding and visibility using structured data.
static_description: Relevant JSON-LD scripts embedded within head tags across pages to define entity relationships for crawlers.

function: Ensure consistent usability and appearance across desktop and mobile devices.
static_description: Layout adjusts fluidly between screen sizes using flexible grids, scalable fonts, and adaptive spacing. Mobile menu collapses into hamburger icon.

interaction_and_states.description: Content reflows automatically to fit smaller screens while maintaining readability and usability.

resource_dependency.imageOptimizationTool: Next.js Image Component or equivalent responsive image solution

function: Deliver optimized media assets quickly regardless of device resolution.
static_description: Images rendered responsively with appropriate srcset attributes ensuring optimal quality and performance.
